AccessType.name: AccessType
AccessType.description: Specifies the access check type for the fields of an sObject.

Address.name: Address
Address.description: Contains methods for accessing the component fields of address compound fields.

ApexPages.name: ApexPages
ApexPages.description: Use ApexPages to add and check for messages associated with the current page, as well as to reference the current page.

Approval.name: Approval
Approval.description: Contains methods for processing approval requests and setting approval-process locks and unlocks on records.

Blob.name: Blob
Blob.description: Contains methods for the Blob primitive data type.

Boolean.name: Boolean
Boolean.description: Contains methods for the Boolean primitive data type.

BusinessHours.name: BusinessHours
BusinessHours.description: Use the BusinessHours methods to set the business hours at which your customer support

Callable.name: Callable
Callable.description: Use the BusinessHours methods to set the business hours at which your customer support

Comparable.name: Comparable
Comparable.description: Adds sorting support for Lists that contain non-primitive

Continuation.name: Continuation
Continuation.description: Use the Continuation class to make callouts asynchronously to a SOAP or REST Web service.

Cookie.name: Cookie
Cookie.description: The Cookie class lets you access cookies for your Salesforce site using Apex.

Crypto.name: Crypto
Crypto.description: Provides methods for creating digests, message authentication codes, and signatures, as well as encrypting and decrypting information.

Database.name: Database
Database.description: Contains methods for creating and manipulating data.

Date.name: Date
Date.description: Contains methods for the Date primitive data type.

Datetime.name: Datetime
Datetime.description: Contains methods for the Datetime primitive data type.

Decimal.name: Decimal
Decimal.description: Contains methods for the Decimal primitive data type.

Double.name: Double
Double.description: Contains methods for the Double primitive data type.

EncodingUtil.name: EncodingUtil
EncodingUtil.description: Use the methods in the EncodingUtil class to encode and decode URL strings, and convert strings to hexadecimal format.

EventBus.name: EventBus
EventBus.description: Contains methods for publishing platform events.

FeatureManagement.name: FeatureManagement
FeatureManagement.description: Use the methods in the System.FeatureManagement class to check and modify the values of feature parameters, and to show or hide custom objects and custom permissions in your subscribersâ€™ orgs.

FlexQueue.name: FlexQueue
FlexQueue.description: Contains methods that reorder batch jobs in the Apex flex queue.

Formula.name: Formula
Formula.description: Contains the recalculateFormulas method that updates (recalculates) all formula fields on the input SObjects

FormulaRecalcFieldError.name: FormulaRecalcFieldError
FormulaRecalcFieldError.description: The return type of the FormulaRecalcResult.getErrors method.

FormulaRecalcResult.name: FormulaRecalcResult
FormulaRecalcResult.description: The return type of the Formula.recalculateFormulas method.

Http.name: Http
Http.description: Use the Http class to initiate an HTTP request and response.

HttpCalloutMock.name: HttpCalloutMock
HttpCalloutMock.description: Enables sending fake responses when testing HTTP callouts.

HttpRequest.name: HttpRequest
HttpRequest.description: Use the HttpRequest class to programmatically create HTTP requests like GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE.

HttpResponse.name: HttpResponse
HttpResponse.description: Use the HttpResponse class to handle the HTTP response returned by the Http class.

Id.name: Id
Id.description: Contains methods for the ID primitive data type.

InstallHandler.name: InstallHandler
InstallHandler.description: Enables custom code to run after a managed package installation or upgrade.

Integer.name: Integer
Integer.description: Contains methods for the Integer primitive data type.

JSON.name: JSON
JSON.description: Contains methods for serializing Apex objects into JSON format and deserializing JSON content that was serialized using the serialize method in this class.

JSONGenerator.name: JSONGenerator
JSONGenerator.description: Contains methods used to serialize objects into JSON content using the standard JSON encoding.

JSONParser.name: JSONParser
JSONParser.description: Represents a parser for JSON-encoded content.

JSONToken.name: JSONToken
JSONToken.description: Contains all token values used for parsing JSON content.

Limits.name: Limits
Limits.description: Contains methods that return limit information for specific resources.

List.name: List
List.description: Contains methods for the List collection type.

Location.name: Location
Location.description: Contains methods for accessing the component fields of geolocation compound fields.

Long.name: Long
Long.description: Contains methods for the Long primitive data type.

Map.name: Map
Map.description: Contains methods for the Map collection type.

Matcher.name: Matcher
Matcher.description: Matchers use Patterns to perform match operations on a character string.

Messaging.name: Messaging
Messaging.description: Contains messaging methods used when sending a single or mass email.

MultiStaticResourceCalloutMock.name: MultiStaticResourceCalloutMock
MultiStaticResourceCalloutMock.description: Utility class used to specify a fake response using multiple resources for testing HTTP callouts.

OrgLimit.name: OrgLimit
OrgLimit.description: Contains methods that provide the name, maximum value, and current value of an org limit.

OrgLimits.name: OrgLimits
OrgLimits.description: Contains methods that provide a list or map of all OrgLimit instances for Salesforce your org, such as SOAP API requests, Bulk API requests, and Streaming API limits.

PageReference.name: PageReference
PageReference.description: A PageReference is a reference to an instantiation of a page. Among other attributes, PageReferences consist of a URL and a set of query parameter names and values.

Pattern.name: Pattern
Pattern.description: Represents a compiled representation of a regular expression.

Queueable.name: Queueable
Queueable.description: Enables the asynchronous execution of Apex jobs that can be monitored.

QueueableContext.name: QueueableContext
QueueableContext.description: Represents the parameter type of the execute() method in a class that implements the Queueable interface and contains the job ID. This interface is implemented internally by Apex.

QuickAction.name: QuickAction
QuickAction.description: Use Apex to request and process actions on objects that allow custom fields, on objects that appear in a Chatter feed, or on objects that are available globally.

RemoteObjectController.name: RemoteObjectController
RemoteObjectController.description: Use RemoteObjectController to access the standard Visualforce Remote Objects operations in your Remote Objects override methods.

ResetPasswordResult.name: ResetPasswordResult
ResetPasswordResult.description: Represents the result of a password reset.

RestContext.name: RestContext
RestContext.description: Contains the RestRequest and RestResponse objects.

RestRequest.name: RestRequest
RestRequest.description: Represents an object used to pass data from an HTTP request to an Apex RESTful Web service method.

RestResponse.name: RestResponse
RestResponse.description: Represents an object used to pass data from an Apex RESTful Web service method to an HTTP response.

SandboxPostCopy.name: SandboxPostCopy
SandboxPostCopy.description: To make your sandbox environment business ready, automate data manipulation or business logic tasks. Extend this interface and add methods to perform post-copy tasks, then specify the class during sandbox creation.

Schedulable.name: Schedulable
Schedulable.description: The class that implements this interface can be scheduled to run at different intervals.

SchedulableContext.name: SchedulableContext
SchedulableContext.description: Represents the parameter type of a method in a class that implements the Schedulable interface and contains the scheduled job ID. This interface is implemented internally by Apex.

Schema.name: Schema
Schema.description: Contains methods for obtaining schema describe information.

Search.name: Search
Search.description: Use the methods of the Search class to perform dynamic SOSL queries.

Security.name: Security
Security.description: Contains methods to securely implement Apex applications.

SelectOption.name: SelectOption
SelectOption.description: A SelectOption object specifies one of the possible values for a Visualforce selectCheckboxes, selectList, or selectRadio component.

Set.name: Set
Set.description: Represents a collection of unique elements with no duplicate values.

Site.name: Site
Site.description: Use the Site Class to manage your Lightning Platform sites.

SObject.name: SObject
SObject.description: Contains methods for the sObject data type.

SObjectAccessDecision.name: SObjectAccessDecision
SObjectAccessDecision.description: Contains the results of a call to the Security.stripInaccessible method and methods to retrieve those results.

StaticResourceCalloutMock.name: StaticResourceCalloutMock
StaticResourceCalloutMock.description: Utility class used to specify a fake response for testing HTTP callouts.

String.name: String
String.description: Contains methods for the String primitive data type.

StubProvider.name: StubProvider
StubProvider.description: StubProvider is a callback interface that you can use as part of the Apex stub API to implement a mocking framework. Use this interface with the Test.createStub() method to create stubbed Apex objects for testing.

System.name: System
System.description: Contains methods for system operations, such as writing debug messages and scheduling jobs.

Test.name: Test
Test.description: Contains methods related to Apex tests.

Time.name: Time
Time.description: Contains methods for the Time primitive data type.

TimeZone.name: TimeZone
TimeZone.description: Represents a time zone. Contains methods for creating a new time zone and obtaining time zone properties, such as the time zone ID, offset, and display name.

Trigger.name: Trigger
Trigger.description: Use the Trigger class to access run-time context information in a trigger, such as the type of trigger or the list of sObject records that the trigger operates on.

TriggerOperation.name: TriggerOperation
TriggerOperation.description: System.TriggerOperation enum values are associated with trigger events.

Type.name: Type
Type.description: Contains methods for getting the Apex type that corresponds to an Apex class and for instantiating new types.

UninstallHandler.name: UninstallHandler
UninstallHandler.description: Enables custom code to run after a managed package is uninstalled.

URL.name: URL
URL.description: Represents a uniform resource locator (URL) and provides access to parts of the URL. Enables access to the Salesforce instance URL.

UserInfo.name: UserInfo
UserInfo.description: Contains methods for obtaining information about the context user.

UserManagement.name: UserManagement
UserManagement.description: Contains methods to manage end users, for example, to register their verification methods, verify their identity, or remove their personal information.

Version.name: Version
Version.description: Use the Version methods to get the version of a managed package of a subscriber and to compare package versions.

WebServiceCallout.name: WebServiceCallout
WebServiceCallout.description: Enables making callouts to SOAP operations on an external Web service. This class is used in the Apex stub class that is auto-generated from a WSDL.

WebServiceMock.name: WebServiceMock
WebServiceMock.description: Enables sending fake responses when testing Web service callouts of a class auto-generated from a WSDL.

XmlStreamReader.name: XmlStreamReader
XmlStreamReader.description: The XmlStreamReader class provides methods for forward, read-only access to XML data. You can pull data from XML or skip unwanted events. You can parse nested XML content thatâ€™s up to 50 nodes deep.

XmlStreamWriter.name: XmlStreamWriter
XmlStreamWriter.description: The XmlStreamWriter class provides methods for writing XML data.
